Description:
Just a Simple Touch of Paradise
Phone Inquiry ID: 81383
This neat and tidy 3-bedroom home is situated on a corner block and a hop, skip and a jump to the Western Port Waters. Receiving a face lift with new carpet, new vinyl floors in wet areas, freshly painted internally & professionally sprayed roof tiles, new power points with USB connections bring this face lift into a modern era.
Open plan living with separate dining or secondary living space comes with split system heating / cooling for additional comfort.
Ample parking available with plenty of storage options with large outdoor shed and small garden shed.
With low maintenance gardens to look after, you will have more time to explore the Bass Coast or take the boat and launch from the newly upgraded 24hr boat ramp only 15 minutes away.
Grantville offer amenities such as medical, cafes, bakery & post office.
With the dual lane Bass Highway at the end of the street and major shopping centres only 25 minutes away this is the perfect place to settle into a new and relaxing lifestyle that comes with living near the coast
A must see property with inspections by appointment only.

Description:
Reduced - An Amazing New Price. Inspect Now!
Here you have an opportunity to secure a brand new house and land package for the family which is complete and ready for you to move into. It offers a separate rumpus room and an amazing open plan Kitchen/dining & large living. Kitchen with electric cooking, Island bench, 900mm stove top & oven and walk in pantry; 4 bedrooms, master with full ensuite and walk in robes. Split system air conditioning & this home is fully insulated. Under roof line Alfresco area perfect for family BBQ's & entertaining. This wonderful property is tiled & carpeted through out, blinds, fly screens, clothesline + double remote garage all included. It's a turn key package, just bring the family!

Description:
BACK ON THE MARKET!
Set on a large 700sqm (approx) allotment this gorgeous home is only 2 years young and has been finished off ready for you to move in and enjoy. With 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 2 living areas, a double garage and extra-wide side access it has all the space a growing family will need and is walking distance to schools, public transport and shops.
The master bedroom is spacious and bright and is complemented by a walk-in robe, ceiling fan and ensuite with double vanity and extra-large shower. The remaining 3 bedrooms all have built-in robes and are serviced by a family bathroom with bathtub and modern fixings.
The kitchen is the heart of this home and features a large island bench with ample work space and storage, 20mm stone bench tops, big walk-in pantry, dishwasher, stainless-steel 900mm free-standing stove and is flooded with natural light. The open plan kitchen, living and dining creates a family-friendly environment perfect for those who like to entertain or just relax at home.
A separate formal lounge gives the kids somewhere to escape, the clever floor plan making this the ideal play room, separated from the main living zone. The home features lots of additional storage including garage shelving, walk in linen, and extra laundry cupboards.
Outside is double gates to the back yard, making this the ideal home for a tradie, or someone with a caravan, boat or trailer. An intimate outdoor entertaining area opens up off the lounge room, creating a flowing indoor-outdoor living zone.
This home is better than new with landscaping and finishing touches all completed, it really is a move in and enjoy.
Please Note: Photo ID is required for all inspections.

Description:
UNIQUE FORESHORE LOCATION!!!
Very rare do these size foreshore blocks become available so don't procrastinate if you are looking for that perfect coastal block to build your dream home - your search ends here with this generous 843 sq.m. allotment which has subdivision approval.
Situated in the popular coastal town of Corinella and well known for its fishing. The land is flat and has water views from both front and rear of property so great investment for development. Just metres away from your new driveway are walking /riding tracks leading to the Corinella Jetty and 24 hour boat ramp and also the lookout where you can see across Westernport Bay to French Island , San Remo and Cowes. If you are real energetic you can walk all the way to Coronet Bay swimming beach and stop on the way to have breakfast or lunch at the newly opened Fig & The Bay Café on the way. Corinella offers a relaxing lifestyle with general store/post office, community centre, playground , tennis courts, lawn bowls, hall and only 5 minutes to local primary school and kindergarten. Grantville township with a permanent doctor surgery, chemist, ambulance depot, newsagency, hairdresser , cafes and more are within 10 minutes drive. Phillip Island and all its attractions 25 minutes in the other direction.
Easy commute to CBD with dual lane highway.
You may also view this property on www.yourlandshop.com.au
Disclaimer - We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable. However, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective purchasers are advised to carry out their own investigations. www.1stre.com.au

Description:
THAT SEVENTIES FEELING!
On offer here is a quality offering within the township of Grantville noting the unique position being in a quiet court location on an elevated block of approximately 720 square metres. The home is a brick veneer with relatively flat roofline and great height for a single storey build!
Did we mention the views? Fantastic scope for the rural and water view client with current views out to tree canopy from surrounding properties.
Upon entry to the home, we are greeted with an impeccably maintained and presented property which is in close to original condition throughout. Reflecting a 1970's character, the property offers three large bedrooms, the master suite includes double robes, walk in robe and ensuite. The second bedroom includes built in robes and air conditioner, the third bedroom has plenty of room for a good sized bedroom plus space for the home office.
Whilst being an older home, the layout offers plenty of space with two large living zones, high ceilings, at height skylights, timber panelling to walls in sections, original light fittings and plenty of windows which provide natural light. The living zones are quite central in the home.
Externally the property is beautifully maintained and offers manicured gardens, a permanent table and bench seat, rose garden and mature fruit trees. A large water tank also feeds the house, single lock up garage with internal access as well as a single carport to the front of the property which has added height for the caravan or boat storage as well!
The house truly is a home, your inspection is a must on this one! Contact the friendly team at Alex Scott & Staff today to arrange your inspection on 5678 8433.

Description:
BEACH, ENTERTAINING, FAMILY HOME AND SO MUCH MORE
Positioned less than a 50-metre walk from the beach, this elegant 4-bedroom modern home presents itself on a staggering 1,227m2 block of land.
Walking into the wide entrance of the home, you’re immediately greeted to double doors concealing an oversized master bedroom, consisting of a ceiling fan, large walk-in robe and an ensuite with a spa bath, the other 3 bedrooms all have built in robes. The home features a full alarm system, solar hot water, block out blinds, a powder room and ducted heating/cooling, in the main areas the home has down lights.
The spacious kitchen features an above average amount of bench space, an electric hotplate, standard oven and a dishwasher. Towards the end of the home is a rumpus room, that then leads out into an entertainer’s heaven- an enclosed and tiled alfresco area, surrounded by café blinds, there is also outside access from the open plan dining area, which is perfect for a future alfresco to extend to the existing.
Outside the home, you have side access, which leads you down a gravel driveway and into a double shed/workshop. The backyard is home to green grass, fruit trees, a vegetable garden and plants across the fences with a rainwater tank caught off the shed to service these areas. At the end of the yard there is a gate which backs onto a small reserve which you can walk down 50 metres and gain access to the beach.

Description:
As New With a Perfect Location
This stunning 2-storey, 7 year old home has been immaculately maintained and cared for and is truly move in ready. With 4 bedrooms, 2 bathroom, 2 living areas inside with a big 2 car garage plus additional extra-height 2 car carport this one will suit many buyers. Designed to be low-maintenance sit, back relax, and enjoy.
The home itself is cleverly designed with a master bedroom (with walk-in robe and ensuite) living area, kitchen, laundry and powder room downstairs. Upstairs consists of the remaining bedrooms, study, bathroom and living area. With quality timber flooring and high end fixtures and fittings throughout, this one will please the eye from the moment you walk in.
The open plan kitchen living and dining, is modern and bright with 40mm stone benchtops, 900mm cooking appliances, double under-mount sink, dishwasher and pot drawers.
Upstairs is an open 2nd living area with separate study. The 3 remaining bedrooms are spacious and bright and are serviced by a large family bathroom.
The home features plantation shutters and double glazed windows throughout, plenty of ceiling fans, ducted heating and 2 split systems to ensure year-round comfort.
Outside is a double attached garage, professionally fitted out by Garage King, plus an additional extra-height Stratco carport, perfect for the boat, caravan or truck.
The downstairs living opens up to the large rear deck with low maintenance rear-yard, perfect for year-round entertaining.
Walking distance to school, kinder, daycare, public transport, shops, doctor and dentist the location could not be more perfect for those that like convenience on their doorstep.
Please Note: Photo ID is required for all inspections

Description:
MONOMEITH PARK - SEEKING NEW CUSTODIANS
This is literally the chance of a lifetime opportunity to acquire one of the last remaining larger premier rural holdings strategically located on the south eastern fringe of Melbourne.
Monomeith Park comprising 565 acres (approx) in 3 titles and a magnificently maintained heritage listed homestead and outbuilding complex lays claim to some of the finest grazing land in Australia.
Steeped in history, this last remaining portion of the well-known Bourke family's original holding is offered for genuine sale as the owners move to retirement.
Key features include:
- 565 acres, 3 titles, bitumen road access, 85 kilometres to Melbourne.
- Outstanding beef fattening and dairy country, reliable rainfall.
- Water supply includes dam, 5 bores with windmills and troughs.
- Genuinely adaptable to combine equine activities along with beef.
- Excellent strategic location for livestock markets and racing centres.
- Magnificently maintained 3BR WB 1800s homestead, heritage listed.
- Accompanying weatherboard outbuilding complex, stables, barn, dairy.
- Outstanding value and scope for numerous enterprises, including tourism.
Inspection strictly by appointment only.
For further information please call Ray Cullen on 0429 977313

Address: 3-7 Island View Road The Gurdies VIC 3984
Description:
MAGNIFICENT HOME, WATER VIEWS ON 3 BLOCKS, POTENTIAL FOR A BnB & AMAZING SUNSETS
This property is situated on a whopping 1652m2 block (approx), rare as hens teeth, 3 blocks in total and screams WOW FACTOR!
2 storey spacious and modern home, well looked after with views of Westernport Bay & French Island. 3 bedrooms with robes, 2 living areas, 1 downstairs 1 upstairs. 2 bathrooms, 1 upstairs 1 downstairs.
Near new carpet. Coonara, split system reverse cycle unit plus an electric log heater.
Kitchen has a stylish granite benchtop. Dishwasher, electric cooking appliances & pantry.
Open plan kitchen, meals & lounge upstairs overlooking the birds eye view of the amazing balcony, water views and magnificent sunsets.
Downstairs is the other living area/guest room with bathroom and another bedroom. Perfect to set up as a BnB if this is of interest or for the teenage kids.
2 alfresco/bbq/ entertaining areas with classy slate floors. The balcony is huge with block out blinds/ceiling fans. Large stainless steel BBQ included. The downstairs alfresco is similar adjoining the guest room/teenage retreat or the potential BnB.
The gardens are absolutely incredible, tropical oasis, you would think you're walking through a rainforest, it's something you need to see for yourself, you will be blown away on how beautiful it is, the king parrots and rosella's visit for a feed too.
Large double size shed, high clearance for a boat or caravan. Single carport and another carpark for whatever you want.
5 water tanks and 12 solar panels 3.0KW, cheap way to live when you think about it. Call me today to book your inspection.

Beautiful Bay Views to Inspire a Spectacular Design

Approximately 100 meters to the foreshore, this rare offering will appeal to those seeking a convenient easy-care living.
Contact Daniel or Tamara @realty Bass Coast

This block would be ideal for any persons wanting to build their dream home, a spec home or someone wanting to invest in a block of land to build or sell later down the track.

Description:
COASTAL ENTRY LEVEL INVESTMENT
Get in quick to this entry level investment property. This little beauty of a home is ready for you to pick up and make it your own! Plan the future while it is currently rented to great tenants who look after the home like their own.
On offer is a deceptively large house, entry into open plan lounge room with good natural light throughout, stepping through to the meals area which is serviced by a large kitchen space with walk in butlers pantry. A central hallway leads you down to the huge master bedroom with robes, the second bedroom is also a great size with the third being a good home office/spare bedroom. The main bathroom includes a shower over bath setup with a separate toilet.
The block is relatively low maintenance with good lawns, a concrete pad which would be perfect for a single garage!
Contact the friendly team at Alex Scott & Staff Bass Valley today to arrange your inspection on 5678 8433

Description:
JUMP INTO THE BEST BAYSIDE LOCATION BEFORE ITS TOO LATE!
A great size block to build your dream home in front of this stunning waterside location, Corinella is known for its 24 hour boat ramp, great fishing, scenic coastal walks and magnificent surrounds.
This area is on its way to being one the most sort after bayside locations also known to the locals as the Paris end of Corinella.
Close to Local Primary School and Kindergarten and Local Shopping precinct of Grantville, an easy commute on the dual lane Bass Highway to the CBD, Wonthaggi, San Remo and Phillip Island.
Don't put your money in the bank, this location is a sure investment, the growth in Corinella will be amazing so don't miss out!

Description:
A CUT ABOVE THE REST
This superior modern, family friendly & spacious home is sure to appeal. Heaps of room for the kids and the dog makes one big happy family. With 3 bedrooms, bedrooms 2 and 3 have got built in robes. The master consists of a full ensuite and walk in robe to the front of the house. Spacious lounge with heating and cooling throughout, 2 living areas in total.
Stylish open plan kitchen - meals area with stainless steel dishwasher and a 900mm oven. A large walk in pantry which could be easily converted into a butlerâs pantry if you wanted to plus a beautiful Caesar stone bench top with silver flecks throughout. Trendy black blinds and curtains to finish it off.
To the rear of the house you will find the other living area which adjoins the other 2 bedrooms, bathroom, toilet and laundry.
Blank canvas backyard so you can do what you wish but it does have a garden shed. Double garage on remote control and backyard access, established gardens to the front yard. All this on a 577m2 block.
Easy access to Wonthaggi, Cranbourne and Pakenham and all freeways.
Situated along the popular Westernport Bay for its fishing. A couple of mins from Grantville. Come and enjoy the simple easy lifestyle with a fantastic country feel in a lovely community. Call today.

Description:
THIS IS COUNTRY & COASTAL LIVING AT ITS BEST!
Thinking of making that important sea change move then have a look at this attractive coastal property which ticks all the boxes and has plenty of kerbside appeal!!!!
The property is set on a large 1/2 acre allotment offering both rural and water views.
Featuring -
* 4 bedrooms plus study/office
* Spacious Master bedroom with walk thru robe and private balcony taking in views to Phillip Island/San Remo bridge
* Formal living area
* Fire room/family area with sliding door to undercover spa area
* Modern kitchen
* Dining/meals area with sliding door to decking
* 3 bathrooms
* Good size laundry
Additional features -
* Wood heater
* Split-system air conditioning x 2
* Ceiling fans
* Plenty of storage
* Parquetry flooring and carpet
* 12 solar panels - 2.5 kw
* Wide entrance for easy furniture access
* Country style front verandah
* Circular concrete driveway
* Double size carport
* Carport
THE BIG EXTRA BONUS - The property boasts a high quality unit which lends itself to income potential, elderly parents, extended family or teenagers retreat.
Bring the boat, caravan and extra vehicles as there is plenty of space or ideal for kids pony.
Located close to shop, 24 hour boat ramp, v-line bus and café. The local shops which has permanent doctor, chemist, bank, ambulance depot, newsagency etc. are only approx. 7 mins.
Major shopping centre and Phillip Island approx. 25 mins and easy commute to CBD approx. 110 kms. Corinella is well known for its great fishing and peaceful lifestyle.
5 bed
4 bathrooms
3 car

Description:
HOLIDAY, INVESTEMENT OR SIMPLY ENJOY!
Grantville - This well-presented and attractive home will suit all types of buyers, Investors, family or holiday house. This home is located in a quiet back street and is perfectly well maintained with nothing to be done, just move in and start enjoying. Currently tenanted for $1478/month.
The home offers two big bedrooms plus a study area which can be easily converted to three bedrooms, a spacious open plan living area, recently upgraded kitchen and new split system installed.
Either relax on the front veranda watching the sunset or play in the rear yard with the secure inground pool.
There is a three-car carport and plenty of open parking area.
Grantville is a fantastic location on the Bass Coast, situated approximately 1.5 hours from Melbourne, 20 minutes to Lang Lang and 15 minutes to Phillip Island. A family friendly suburb offering licensed grocery store, bakeries, fast food, jetty, boat ramp, parks and beaches.
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN HOMES.
**Please Note - Open for Inspections are subject to change or cancellation without prior notice**
Feature includes
. Split system heating/cooling
. Swimming pool
. Walking distance to water
. Close to shops
. New kitchen

Description:
FORESHORE BLOCK!!
MOTIVATED VENDOR!! Situated in a peaceful environment opposite Corinella foreshore, is this building block which lends itself to a seaside lifestyle, offering gorgeous bay views and stunning sunsets from a two-storey dwelling. The vendor has existing plans for a G.J. Gardner Home. This coastal block is in a new exclusive estate which has a café 2 minutes walk from your new address, that caters for the early morning cooked breakfast or to entertain family and friends visiting. The scenic coastal track takes you to the look out or walk all the way to Coronet Bay swimming beach. Bring along the boat as a 24 hour boat ramp is only a stone throw away.
Corinella is a developing community and is still Victoria's best kept secret. The local shops consisting of permanent doctor, ambulance depot, newsagency, chemist, bank, cafes, wineries, primary school and hardware store approx. 7 mins. Major shopping centres and Phillip Island all within 20 mins drive. Easy commute to CBD with dual lane highway.
This is an affordable foreshore block, so it won't last!!!!!!
